Container.Name: wh-syncthing
Container.Overview: Syncthing is a free and open source software that syncs files between two or more devices in real time, without a central server.
Container.Requires: Syncthing requires: - (Optional) "Network Type" set to 'host' for improved performance. Learn more: https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/blob/main/README-Docker.md#discovery

Config.Name: Syncthing web UI port
Config.Description: The TCP port Syncthing listens on.

Config.Name: Syncthing file transfers port
Config.Description: The TCP port file transfers listens on.

Config.Name: Syncthing QUIC file transfers port
Config.Description: The UDP port QUIC file transfers listens on.

Config.Name: Syncthing local discovery broadcast port
Config.Description: The UDP port local discover broadcasts listens on.

Config.Name: Syncthing storage
Config.Description: The location where Syncthing stores its data.
